name: FiftyTifty - Thrall Rebalance
description:
-Lifts all human enemies up to level 50
-Buffs tier 1, 2, & 3 thralls
-Reduces the thralls' health to that of the unconverted thralls
-Also applies to animals, monsters, pets, and bosses 
-Pets are heavily nerfed, and are only as strong as their wild counterparts
-Boss pets are now just 50% stronger than the normal variants
-Skeleton have their hyperarmour back again, like in Early Access
-Skeleton have no armour resistance
-Spiders are heavily nerfed. Only deadly in swarms.
-No XP gained from killing creatures. Mainly a workaround due to broken NPCStatsAndGrowths operations in Devkit
changeNote:
Lost everything in a reinstall of Windows, so I went ahead and rebuilt it from the ground up, balanced everything added in the updates, and broadened the scope to animals, monsters, and bosses.

This took about an hour and a half to make. You're bloody welcome like.

Edit: Fuck off, this took way more time than it should have, to learn how to un-crapify the thralls after that update in December 2019.
author: FiftyTifty
